root: ^"Mom's doing really well actually." says Annie.
^"Well, gone out more on trips and stuff. Hiking. Fishing obviously. Eat breakfast together and talk every morning.
^"Thought you always ate in your room?"
^"We know." They sit silently for a moment. "She's excited about her move too."
^Marvin almost drops his rod. "Move? I didn't know she was moving– where's she moving?"
^"Calm down. She's looking at a few places a couple miles away. Get scared so easy."
^Marvin shakes his head. They sit queitly again, enjoying the sounds of the lake and forest.
^"You know, we haven't talked since the divorce." says Marvin
^"Seriously? I didn't notice... Feel like I should have." Annie drops her head.
^Marvin looks over at Annie. "Don't worry. Busy time. A lot going on."
